analyzed: vihārā upanikkhami  a laddhāḥ cetasaḥ santi
translated: I left the dwelling, 🔽Not having attained peace of mind,
Not having mastery over my mind.
My craving was destroyed. 🔽Because of my delight in heedfulness
In the many things that are suffering,
The destruction of craving has been reached,
And the Buddha’s instruction has been done.”
The Group of Two is finished.
